Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Potion = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso local vPlayer
local spikeyCD local spikeCo
Tool.Enabled = true
local drinkAnim
local instructionGui local activated = false
function activateAbility(key) key = key:lower() if (key == "q" or key == "e" or key == "c" or key == "z") and activated then spikeScript = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("SpikeScript") if spikeScript == nil then spikeScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("SpikeScript"):Clone() spikeScript.Parent = vCharacter keyValue = spikeScript:FindFirstChild("Key") end if keyValue then keyValue.Value = key end if spikeScript then spikeScript.Disabled = false end else -- do nothing end end
function onActivated() if (Tool.Enabled == false) or activated then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if myHumanoid == nil or vPlayer == nil then return end
drinkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.DrinkAnim) if drinkAnim then drinkAnim:Play() end wait(0.5)
Potion.Transparency = 1.0
instructionGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") instructionGui.Parent = vPlayer.PlayerGui
local frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 100) frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.02, 0, 0.5, 0) frame.Parent = instructionGui frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
local image = Instance.new("ImageLabel") image.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) image.Parent = frame image.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59123068" image.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) image.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 activated = true
wait(30.0) if instructionGui then instructionGui:Remove() end activated = false Potion.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(activateAbility) end end
function onUnequipped() if instructionGui then instructionGui:Remove() end if drinkAnim then drinkAnim:Stop() end Potion.Transparency = 0.0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

function waitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local vCharacter = script.Parent local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myHead = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Head") local myRightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") local myLeftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") local myRightLeg = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Leg") local myLeftLeg = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Leg")
local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local key = waitForChild(script, "Key")
local spikeDamage = 15
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local spike = Instance.new("Part") spike.FormFactor = 3 spike.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 5.5, 0.2) spike.Shape = "Block" spike.Name = "Spike" spike.CanCollide = false
local spikeMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") spikeMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59092052" spikeMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59091614" spikeMesh.Parent = spike
local spikeClones = {}
local LeftSpike local RightSpike
local removingSpikes = false
function poke(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(spikeDamage) end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid and player then creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Name = "creator" creator.Value = player creator.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creator, 1) end end
function weldSpikes(WeldParts, C1s) local NewSpikes = {} local LeftWeld local RightWeld local Welds = {}
for i = 1, 2 do if WeldParts[i] then NewSpikes[i] = spike:Clone() NewSpikes[i].Parent = vCharacter table.insert(spikeClones, NewSpikes[i])
local NewWeld = Instance.new("Weld") NewWeld.Part0 = WeldParts[i] NewWeld.Part1 = NewSpikes[i] NewWeld.C1 = C1s[i] NewWeld.Parent = WeldParts[i] Welds[i] = NewWeld
NewSpikes[i].Touched:connect(poke) end end
local LeftMesh local RightMesh local Meshes = {LeftMesh, RightMesh}
for j = 1, 10 do for i = 1, 2 do if NewSpikes[i] then Meshes[i] = NewSpikes[i]:FindFirstChild("Mesh") if Meshes[i] then Meshes[i].Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1 + (j * 0.5), 1) end if Welds[i] then Welds[i].C1 = Welds[i].C1 - Vector3.new(0, 0.3, 0) end end end wait(0.15) end end
function spikeyDestruction() if removingSpikes then return end if myHumanoid then if key then if #spikeClones >= 4 then removingSpikes = true for i = 1, #spikeClones do if spikeClones[i] then spikeClones[i]:Remove() end wait(0.1) end removingSpikes = false spikeClones = {} end if key.Value == "q" then weldSpikes({myLeftArm, myRightArm}, {CFrame.Angles(0, 0, -math.pi/2), CFrame.Angles(0, 0, math.pi/2)}) elseif key.Value == "e" then weldSpikes({myLeftLeg, myRightLeg}, {CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, -math.pi/6, 0), CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, math.pi/6, 0)}) elseif key.Value == "z" then weldSpikes({myTorso, myTorso}, {CFrame.new(0.5, 0, 0.3) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, -math.pi/6, 0), CFrame.new(-0.5, 0, 0.3) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, math.pi/6, 0)}) elseif key.Value == "c" then weldSpikes({myTorso, myTorso}, {CFrame.new(0.5, 0, 0.3) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, math.pi/6, 0), CFrame.new(-0.5, 0, 0.3) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, -math.pi/6, 0)}) else -- do nothing end end end end
if key then local connection = key.Changed:connect(spikeyDestruction) end
spikeyDestruction()
wait(30.0) if connection then connection:disconnect() end for i = 1, #spikeClones do if spikeClones[i] then spikeClones[i]:Remove() end end script:Remove()
